column1: Local Foods////I really love this place! It's very cute and very Rice Village (nice atmosphere
column2: slightly hipster-y). We sat outside on the patio with the lights and it was super nice. I got the banh mi sandwich
column3: which was good but not spectacular. However the quinoa side I got was sooo gooood
column4: and the slaw wasn't bad either. I got the lemontade (can't remember exactly what it was called....lemonade
column7: and orange juice) which was really good and super refreshing. From what my friends were telling me you really couldn't go wrong with any of the sandwiches - the asian salad was huuuuge!!
